language.entry: The Torchbearer wears a light but sturdy breastplate so that he can lead from the front and smite the enemies of the light with his blessed torch.

Leading by example the torchbearer inspires his companions and leads them to greater heigths, special training with his blessed torch allows him to bash and channel the power of the light against his enemies in the form of divine fire.

While camping the Torchbearer will attempt to kindle the campfire using a special blessed incense and bless his companions with the power of the light, He will also try to scout ahead into the darkness with his torch.
Follow my lead friends, the light is on our side!
Stay here friends I will find us a path.
In radiance we will find victory!
The flame will light our path!
Let there be no doubt, justice prevails!
Folow me, I shall bring you to safety!
Come, we shall purify this place!
Keep pushing, these fiends shall be purged!
Why are you looking at me like that friend?
Warmer! the flame isn't strong enough!
Kindle the flame! We must burn brighter!
My blood will pave a way to freedom!
This darkness will kill us all, I will lead the way!
Must I do everything around here?
By the light! you people are dumb.
I will not allow you to drag me down to your level!
You are standing in my light.
Friends, why do you not follow my lead!?
All roads end the same way...
One day the light will fade and all will be dark.
I should've thrown myself into the flame...
More fuel! we need more fuel!
This way! I can see the light!
Kindle the flame! We must show our dedication!
Keep looking forward... I must keep looking forward...
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Friends please, I am on your side.
What are you waiting for? I am right here!
I will not fall! come at me fiends!
By the light! you are a fool.
I don't need any help! I will take care of this myself!
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
Wait friends! we must pray together first!
This day is blessed! just look at how bright the sun shines!
Praise the sun! praise the blessed flame!
I, I, I don't know what to do!
Keep that thing away from me!
No, that's what they want us to do!
I'm not doing anything with you standing so close to me!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
Ah... the fire calms me so...
Bless you my friend! bless us all!
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must i do everything myself?
Do not think you can fool me, I shall lead the way!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found the light!
All shall be forgiven when one dedicates oneself to the flame!
Yes flame! I will obey this sacred command!
I can hear such beutifull singing...
Come and test yourself against the light!
Run, I will hold them off...
Yes! I shall be a beacon of faith!
Don't stand so close to me!
Yes holy flame! I will show them the way!
A sacrifice! the flame desires a sacrifice!
This pain will help me focus.
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We have not yet shown be truth of the flame to them!
It is using the shadows against me!
You fools caused this with your incompetence!
This is how it should be.
Even the holy flame won't affect them!
As it was written in the scriptures...
You actually hit something this time?
All you are doing is making it more mad!
No! We must convert them to the true faith!
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
How can you miss something that easy to hit?
Did you not pray with me?
The flame wishes there to be peace!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
I am right here you fools!
Praise be! the flame has marked you as a saint!
This is where I should be.
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
look into my torch, feel the warmth.
We shall bring the light to this place.
I have your back, don't be afraid.
The wound is only surface level.
See, it didn't hurt a bit.
Don't give up, I'm right behind you.
Come friend! we are not done yet!
This prayer always lifts my spirit.
Anybody up for a game of chess?
Wish I brought my checkers board...
You cannot take me! The light is on my side!
The Torchbearer wears a light but sturdy breastplate so that he can lead from the front and smite the enemies of the light with his blessed torch.

Leading by example the torchbearer inspires his companions and leads them to greater heigths, special training with his blessed torch allows him to bash and channel the power of the light against his enemies in the form of divine fire.

While camping the Torchbearer will attempt to kindle the campfire using a special blessed incense and bless his companions with the power of the light, He will also try to scout ahead into the darkness with his torch.

Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found the light!
All shall be forgiven when one dedicates oneself to the flame!
Yes flame! I will obey this sacred command!
I can hear such beutifull singing...
Come and test yourself against the light!
Run, I will hold them off...
Yes! I shall be a beacon of faith!
Don't stand so close to me!
Yes holy flame! I will show them the way!
A sacrifice! the flame desires a sacrifice!
This pain will help me focus.
Maybe this will pay fot what I have done.
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We have not yet shown be truth of the flame to them!
It is using the shadows against me!
You fools caused this with your incompetence!
This is how it should be.
Even the holy flame won't affect them!
As it was written in the scriptures...
You actually hit something this time?
All you are doing is making it more mad!
No! We must convert them to the true faith!
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
How can you miss something that easy to hit?
Did you not pray with me?
The flame wishes there to be peace!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
I am right here you fools!
Praise be! the flame has marked you as a saint!
This is where I should be.
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!

No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
No, I must do this myself...
look into my torch, feel the warmth.
We shall bring the light to this place.
I have your back, don't be afraid.
The wound is only surface level.
See, it didn't hurt a bit.
Don't give up, I'm right behind you.
Come friend! we are not done yet!
This prayer always lifts my spirit.
Anybody up for a game of chess?
Wish I brought my checkers board...
You cannot take me! The light is on my side!
The Torchbearer wears a light but sturdy breastplate so that he can lead from the front and smite the enemies of the light with his blessed torch.

Leading by example the torchbearer inspires his companions and leads them to greater heigths, special training with his blessed torch allows him to bash and channel the power of the light against his enemies in the form of divine fire.

While camping the Torchbearer will attempt to kindle the campfire using a special blessed incense and bless his companions with the power of the light, He will also try to scout ahead into the darkness with his torch.
Follow my lead friends, the light is on our side!
Stay here friends I will find us a path.
In radiance we will find victory!
The flame will light our path!
Let there be no doubt, justice prevails!
Folow me, I shall bring you to safety!
Come, we shall purify this place!
Keep pushing, these fiends shall be purged!
Why are you looking at me like that friend?
Warmer! the flame isn't strong enough!
Kindle the flame! We must burn brighter!
My blood will pave a way to freedom!
This darkness will kill us all, I will lead the way!
Must I do everything around here?
By the light! you people are dumb.
I will not allow you to drag me down to your level!
You are standing in my light.
Friends, why do you not follow my lead!?
All roads end the same way...
One day the light will fade and all will be dark.
I should've thrown myself into the flame...
More fuel! we need more fuel!
This way! I can see the light!
Kindle the flame! We must show our dedication!
Keep looking forward... I must keep looking forward...
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Friends please, I am on your side.
What are you waiting for? I am right here!
I will not fall! come at me fiends!
By the light! you are a fool.
I don't need any help! I will take care of this myself!
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
Wait friends! we must pray together first!
This day is blessed! just look at how bright the sun shines!
Praise the sun! praise the blessed flame!
I, I, I don't know what to do!
Keep that thing away from me!
No, that's what they want us to do!
I'm not doing anything with you standing so close to me!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
Ah... the fire calms me so...
Bless you my friend! bless us all!
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must i do everything myself?
Do not think you can fool me, I shall lead the way!
